'''Benson Kwan''' is a [[General Surgery|surgical]] [[Internship|intern]] at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]].

==History==
<!--Replace this line, including the arrow brackets, with the article body and details. If no information can go under the sections then go ahead and remove them.-->

==Personality==
Benson "Blue" Kwan is sharp-witted, impatient and brilliant. He is generous by nature but competitive to a fault, naturally gifted, and used to winning at everything. A family crisis interfered with his career plans and now he's got a lot to prove.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Jules Millin]]====
In the locker room after recording the sex ed videos, Benson and Jules shared a quiet and intense look. They then headed to an on call room, where Benson kissed Jules. After she assured Benson that it would not happen again, that there were no feelings involved and that she didn't like him, the two had sex.<ref>[[Let's Talk About Sex]], 19x03</ref>

==Notes and Trivia==
*In initial reports surrounding the character, he was named ''Daniel'' Kwan.
*He was valedictorian, all state track & field, and national chess champion in high school.<ref>[[Thunderstruck]], 19x06</ref>
